tool.name: Load Blast2GO results
tool.command:
tmp_dir=`mktemp -d -p '@DATA_DIR@'`
&&
cp '${results}' "\${tmp_dir}/blast2go.gaf"
&&
tripal load_go
@ANALYSIS@
#if str($query_re): --re-name '${query_re}' #end if
$query_uniquename
--query-type '$query_type'
@AUTH@
"\${tmp_dir}/blast2go.gaf"
> $output_log

param.name: query_type
param.label: The feature type of the query
param.help: It must be a valid Sequence Ontology term. e.g. 'gene', 'mRNA', 'contig'

param.name: query_re
param.label: Regular expression to extract the feature unique name from the query name
param.help: leave empty if the first word in query name is sufficient

param.name: query_uniquename
param.label: The feature type of the query
param.help: It must be a valid Sequence Ontology term. e.g. 'gene', 'mRNA', 'contig'
